scripts.test: rm -rf logs & PIPELINE_USER=E2euser node -r ts-node/register --max-old-space-size=4096 main.ts
scripts.test:local: rm -rf logs & BROWSER=chrome ENV=dev PIPELINE_USER=E2euser node -r ts-node/register --max-old-space-size=4096 main.ts
scripts.test:devlocal: rm -rf logs & BROWSER=chrome ENV=devLocal PIPELINE_USER=E2euser node -r ts-node/register --max-old-space-size=4096 main.ts
scripts.test:headless: rm -rf logs & BROWSER=chromeHeadless ENV=devx PIPELINE_USER=E2euser node -r ts-node/register --max-old-space-size=4096 main.ts
